## 0.2.0 (2022-09-06)

- Added support for `optimum` and `transformers.onnx` models
- Dropped support for Ruby < 2.7

## 0.1.3 (2021-09-25)

- Added text generation
- Added fill mask

## 0.1.2 (2020-11-24)

- Added feature extraction

## 0.1.1 (2020-10-05)

- Fixed question answering for Ruby < 2.7

## 0.1.0 (2020-10-01)

- First release
